Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_REDBOOK_STATUS

The basic type MILES_REDBOOK_STATUS specifies the redbook device status.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 REDBOOK_ERROR No CD is inserted, or it isn't an audio CD. (Debugger value: 0).
 REDBOOK_PLAYING An audio CD is currently playing. (Debugger value: 1).
 REDBOOK_PAUSED An audio CD is inserted and it is paused. (Debugger value: 2).
 REDBOOK_STOPPED An audio CD is inserted and it isn't playing. (Debugger value: 3).


Group: CD Audio (Redbook) Services
Related Functions: AIL_redbook_status
